author: Sam Goldfarb
title: Treasurys Decline Against Backdrop of Fed Meeting, AB InBev Bond Sale
text:
U.S. government bond prices fell Tuesday as investors looked forward to the conclusion of the Federal Reserveâ€™s meeting on Wednesday and cleared space in their portfolios for new bonds from Anheuser-Busch InBev SA.
The yield on the 10-year Treasury note settle at 2.881%, compared with 2.844% on Monday.
Yields, which rise when bond prices fall,...
